alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Telfair; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 6:02PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Dodge, Telfair and eastern Wilcox Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 601 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Queensland to China Hill to near Red Bluff, and moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Abbeville, Milan, Rhine, Chauncey, Jacksonville, Union, Horse Creek Wma, Antioch Church, Temperance, Browning, China Hill, Five Points and Workmore. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
